content.raw:
Hi Jason, I could not install the package in  jliang_model, Please let me know which version of the ignition robotics have been used, I have tried to compile the code with these two versions: [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math](http://ignitionrobotics.org/libraries/math) and[ http://ignitionrobotics.org/libraries/math](), but I could not because of using wrong version, and I have errors like:
-...../Geometry.hh:53:22: error: ‘Line3’ is not a member of ‘ignition::math’
   bool ClipPlaneLine(ignition::math::Line3<double> &_line,

...../Geometry.hh:53:44: error: expected primary-expression before ‘double’
   bool ClipPlaneLine(ignition::math::Line3<double> &_line,
content.html:
Hi Jason, I could not install the package in jliang_model, Please let me know which version of the ignition robotics have been used, I have tried to compile the code with these two versions: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math and http://ignitionrobotics.org/libraries/math, but I could not because of using wrong version, and I have errors like: -...../Geometry.hh:53:22: error: ‘Line3’ is not a member of ‘ignition::math’ bool ClipPlaneLine(ignition::math::Line3<double> &_line,

...../Geometry.hh:53:44: error: expected primary-expression before ‘double’ bool ClipPlaneLine(ignition::math::Line3<double> &_line,
